医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，用早餐代替晚餐钙可以降低患心脏病的风险早餐和晚餐时摄入的钙量与心血管疾病（CVD）有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Replacing-dinner-calcium-with-breakfast-intake-could-reduce-heart-disease-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Replacing-dinner-calcium-with-breakfast-intake-could-reduce-heart-disease-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5026aa03-7963-4776-a9e5-317114ad5437 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 05:47:00 -0400 Replacing dinner calcium with breakfast intake could reduce heart disease risk, study finds
Genseq 选择 Sapio LIMS 为一流的下一代测序服务提供支持https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Genseq-Selects-Sapio-LIMS-to-Power-Best-in-Class-Next-Generation-Sequencing-Services.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Genseq-Selects-Sapio-LIMS-to-Power-Best-in-Class-Next-Generation-Sequencing-Services.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc05dcd7-7b39-462b-8ba6-ab1381c2b4dc Tue, 23 Apr 2024 05:18:00 -0400 Genseq Selects Sapio LIMS to Power Best-in-Class Next-Generation Sequencing Services
美国研究将久坐和缺乏咖啡与更高的死亡率联系起来每日久坐时间和咖啡摄入量对心血管疾病的独立和综合影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/US-study-links-extended-sitting-and-lack-of-coffee-to-higher-death-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/US-study-links-extended-sitting-and-lack-of-coffee-to-higher-death-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c12af5c3-72dc-41c9-a298-25608c7fbfc8 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 05:13:00 -0400 US study links extended sitting and lack of coffee to higher death rates
Sapio Sciences 通过欧盟-美国数据隐私框架 (DPF) 认证https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Sapio-Sciences-Certified-Under-the-EU-US-Data-Privacy-Framework-(DPF).aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Sapio-Sciences-Certified-Under-the-EU-US-Data-Privacy-Framework-(DPF).aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=634766ac-0e2b-43bc-8ca5-fddd412cfd12 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 05:05:00 -0400 Sapio Sciences Certified Under the E.U.-U.S. Data Privacy Framework (DPF)
新模型改善了心脏病风险预测，特别是对于女性就心脏问题而言，与男性相比，女性心血管疾病的诊断率较低。弗雷明汉风险评分是一种流行的评分系统，用于估计一个人在未来 10 年内患心血管疾病的可能性。它基于年龄、性别、胆固醇水平和血压等因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/New-models-improve-heart-disease-risk-prediction-special-for-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/New-models-improve-heart-disease-risk-prediction-special-for-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70e757b3-4b40-4bd7-b229-72baaea209ff Tue, 23 Apr 2024 04:20:51 -0400 New models improve heart disease risk prediction, especially for women
在健康建议下降的情况下，成本上升推动英国戒烟人数激增研究人员调查了促使吸烟者戒烟的因素，以最终确定 COVID-19 对戒烟的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Rising-costs-fuel-quit-smoking-surge-in-England-amid-health-advice-dip.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Rising-costs-fuel-quit-smoking-surge-in-England-amid-health-advice-dip.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9dec47e-920d-4564-84fc-7a21a3c6834f Tue, 23 Apr 2024 04:20:00 -0400 Rising costs fuel quit-smoking surge in England amid health advice dip
中风幸存者的后向推力的隐藏斗争侧推是一种导致身体向一侧倾斜的临床病症，影响了大约一半的中风幸存者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/The-hidden-struggle-of-lateropulsion-in-中风-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/The-hidden-struggle-of-lateropulsion-in-中风-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4da3b81-2582-4495-a63b-93a4c82e1adc Tue, 23 Apr 2024 04:09:12 -0400 The hidden struggle of lateropulsion in stroke survivors
女医生可以改善患者的治疗效果新研究表明，由女医生治疗的患者死亡率和再入院率较低，女性患者比男性患者受益更多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Female-physicians-may-offer-improved-patent-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Female-practicians-may-offer-improved-patent-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e988398a-f4de-4939-9c60-0cf6e20669dc Tue, 23 Apr 2024 03:58:31 -0400 Female physicians may offer improved patient outcomes
纵向多组学监测为早期胰腺癌诊断铺平道路同行评审的《OMICS：综合生物学杂志》上发表的一份新病例报告描述了纵向多组学监测 (LMOM) 如何帮助检测癌前胰腺肿瘤并导致成功的手术干预。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Longitudinal-multi-omics-monitoring-paves-the-way-for-early-pancreatic-cancer-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Longitudinal-multi-omics-monitoring-paves-the-way-for-early-pancreatic-cancer-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e5364dc-f50b-4076-bb60-3c7b0d220c3b Tue, 23 Apr 2024 03:23:42 -0400 Longitudinal multi-omics monitoring paves the way for early pancreatic cancer diagnosis
研究发现新冠病毒快速变异背后的隐藏机制引起新冠肺炎的 SARS-CoV-2 病毒具有经常产生自身变体的令人不安的能力。其他病毒也会发生变异，但随着 SARS-CoV-2 在大流行期间迅速在整个人类中传播，导致数百万人死亡，该病毒的动态进化带来了严重的问题：它反复挑战我们身体对抗病毒的免疫反应，阻碍了我们的免疫反应。准备更新疫苗的过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Study-discovers-hidden-mechanism-behind-rapid-COVID-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Study-discovers-hidden-mechanism-behind-rapid-COVID-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b35bf62b-8d68-412a-9f07-4cf7ecd14703 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 03:12:23 -0400 Study discovers hidden mechanism behind rapid COVID variants
